data.title: infinity plus
data.meta_description: Short stories, novel extracts, reviews, features... infinity plus showcases the work of some of the world's top science fiction and fantasy authors.
data.text:
N

Linda Nagata

Hooks, Nets and Time - novelette.

Limit of Vision - reviewed in Claude Lalumière's Fantastic Fiction.

Vast - a review by Jon Courtenay Grimwood.

Susan J Napier

Anime: from Akira to Princess Mononoke - a feature-length review by Randy M Dannenfelser & William D Prystauk.

Vera Nazarian

The Compass of Fourteen Dreams: an interview with Vera Nazarian by Nick Gevers.

Dreams of the Compass Rose: The Miracles of Ris by Vera Nazarian - novel extract.

Dreams of the Compass Rose - a review by Nick Gevers.

Rupert Neethling

...writes some of the reviews.

Nemonymous

Nemonymous 1 - a review by Anonymous (with good reason).

Nemonymous 2 - a review by David Mathew.

Nemonymous 3 - a review by Keith Brooke.

Nemonymous 4 - a review by The Mad Wavid.

Nemonymous 5 - a review by Mario Guslandi.

Jess Nevins

The Encyclopedia of Fantastic Victoriana - a review by Marianne Plumridge.

Paul J Newell

The Turning - a review by John Toon.

James Newman

Midnight Rain - a review by Gary Couzens.

Kim Newman

About the author.

...interviewed by David Mathew.

Andy Warhol's Dracula (in Binary 2) - a review by Stuart Carter.

Coppola's Dracula - novella.

Dracula Cha Cha Cha - a review by Stuart Carter.

Judgement of Tears: Anno Dracula 1959 - reviewed in The Alternate Worlds of Science Fiction by Claude Lalumière.

The Man from the Diogenes Club - reviewed in Claude Lalumière's Fantastic Fiction.

The McCarthy Witch Hunt - novelette.

The Pierce-Arrow Stalled, and... - short story.

Stan Nicholls

About the author.

Gerry Anderson: the authorised biography (written with Simon Archer) - a review by Keith Brooke.

Bodyguard of Lightning - novel extract.

Bodyguard of Lightning - a review by Keith Brooke.

John Jarrold interviewed.

Throwing a Wobbly - short story.

Adam Nichols

The War of the Lords Veil, The Pathless Way and The Paladin: Book One of the Whiteblade Saga - all reviewed by John D Owen

Metabolism - short story.

The English Soil Society - a review by Mark Valentine.

The Time Traveler's Wife - reviewed in Claude Lalumière's Fantastic Fiction.

Larry Niven

Destiny's Road - a review by John D Owen.

Rainbow Mars - a review by Peter D Tillman.

Ringworld's Children - reviewed in John D Owen's "Parallel Evolution and Two Big Dumb Objects".

Garth Nix

Sabriel - a review by Meredith.

Non-fiction - the part of infinity plus that includes opinion pieces, recent reviews, etc.

Falling Out of Cars - a review by Josh Lacey.

Needle in the Groove - a review by Noel K Hannan.

Pixel Juice - a review by Noel K Hannan.

Naomi Novik

Temeraire, books 1-3 - a review by Simeon Shoul.

Abigail Nussbaum

The Arthur C Clarke Shortlist 2007 - review-feature.

...interviewed by Nick Gevers.
